Posts.Content: Hello, I am 28 and a mammogram has been sceduled for this monday-today is thursday Aug.26th. My dad has been in battle with multiple myeloma. So, i'm a little bit concerend about cancer being hereditary. Also, my family and I prefer alternative medicine as often as possible. ***So I would like to read the full text on the issue of Mammogram Alternatives please*** and also curious as to why the website would be disallowed on this board. thank you for posting this! looking forward to hearing from you!
Posts.Title: Mammogram Alternatives
